alert.note: Alert for Barton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 9:57AM CDT until May 15 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Barton County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1045 AM CDT. * At 957 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Liberal, or 11 miles west of Lamar, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Prairie State Park... Lamar... Golden City... Liberal... Mulberry... Mindenmines... Lamar Heights... Burgess... Oakton... Iantha... Verdella... Kenoma... Hannon... Boston... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 57 and 71. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
